content.text:
# Filmfare Award for Best Film – Marathi

The Filmfare Award for Best Film is given by the Filmfare magazine as part of its annual Filmfare Awards for Marathi Cinemas.
The award was first given in 1963. Here is a list of the award winners and the nominees of the respective years. Each individual entry shows the title followed by the production company and the producer.
Winner and nominees
